column2: Yaraň) is a town and the administrative center of Yaransky District in Kirov Oblast
column4: located on the Yaran River (Vyatka's basin)
column6: the administrative center of the oblast. Population: 17

column2: it had a central position in the land of Mari and served as the capital of the Mari people. In 1584
column3: Yaransk was founded as a Russian fortress on the Yaran River where the old Mari fortress once stood to defend against the Mari. A posad later grew around the fortress. Town status was granted to Yaransk in 1780.

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Yaransk serves as the administrative center of Yaransky District. As an administrative division
column5: incorporated within Yaransky District as the Town of Yaransk. As a municipal division
column6: the Town of Yaransk is incorporated within Yaransky Municipal District as Yaranskoye Urban Settlement.
